A

Asteroid - Class in gh.asteroids1
Models the asteroid shape used in the Asteroids Applet game.
Asteroid() - Constructor for class gh.asteroids1.Asteroid
Constructs an Asteroid with no rotational velocity, and isAlive by default (see superclass).
AsteroidApplet - Class in gh.asteroids1
A primitive Applet Asteroids-type game that runs in an applet window 600 x 440.
AsteroidApplet() - Constructor for class gh.asteroids1.AsteroidApplet
 

B

BaseVectorShape - Class in gh.asteroids1
Represents the commonality that is the Asteroids game objects.
BaseVectorShape() - Constructor for class gh.asteroids1.BaseVectorShape
Constructs a default BaseVectorShape with all instance variables set to false, zero or null.
Bullet - Class in gh.asteroids1
Models the bullets fired by the Ship in the Asteroid Applet game.
Bullet() - Constructor for class gh.asteroids1.Bullet
Constructs a Bullet shape.

checkCollisions() - Method in class gh.asteroids1.AsteroidApplet
Checks all live game objects for collisions.

D

drawAsteroids() - Method in class gh.asteroids1.AsteroidApplet

drawShip() - Method in class gh.asteroids1.AsteroidApplet
Draws the Ship in the coordinate system; sets the position from an affine transform identity 0,0.

Models the spaceship used in the Asteroids Applet game.
Ship() - Constructor for class gh.asteroids1.Ship

Provides utilities for instantiating and using sound clips.

Default constructor - no args.

U

Updates the position of the live Asteroids in the game.

updateShip() - Method in class gh.asteroids1.AsteroidApplet
Updates the position of the game Ship object; performs a screen position wrap if the ship is moving off the screen.
